field.label: Is Discount Effective
field.comment: If value is set to "No" suppliers commissions will be calculated ignoring discount.

field.label: Enable Notification For Supplier When Profile Is Approved
Allow Supplier To Manage Shipping Costs
Add "Sold by" block On Product Page
Allow To Send Email To Customers When Supplier Creates Invoice
Send Marketplace Profile Fields In Email
field.comment: Add Additional Marketplace Profile Fields to email data. Can contain multiple values separated with ",". Value should be exactly the same as field name. Maximum amount of field - 2.
